article: the fire broke out in the upscale neighborhood of runyon canyon . hollywood hills -- firefighters made quick work of a large fire that broke out at a large two-story home in the upscale runyon canyon area of hollywood hills thursday morning . the blaze was reported before 11:30 a. m. in the 7100 block of senalda road at a partially attached outbuilding to the home . footage from the cbs2 chopper showed flames and smoke shooting hundreds of feet into the air while a resident appeared to be dousing the fire with a hose . los angeles fire department crews responded at around 11:40 a. m. and brought the fire under control within about 20 minutes .

the fire did not spread into the primary residence , lafd said . there was no immediate information on what caused the blaze . there were no reported injuries . the extent of the damage was not confirmed , although it appeared extensive . your @lafd rapidly arrived on-scene and hit it with a hard with a wagon battery and got a quick knockdown . no injury . #greatjobteam ! -- erik scott december 21 , 2017 .
